title: Update welcome text and header logo with uploaded image

requirements.summary: Update the h2 element to display 'Welcome back, [Their User]!' with the authenticated user's display name
acceptanceCriteria: The h2 element displays 'Welcome back, ' followed by the user's display name and an exclamation mark
The display name is dynamically retrieved from the authenticated user's profile
If no user is authenticated, an appropriate fallback is shown

file_operations.description: Update the h2 element in the welcome card section to display 'Welcome back, {displayName}!' using the authenticated user's display name from the profile data. Retrieve the display name via the existing useGetCallerUserProfile hook and apply appropriate fallback text when the user is not authenticated or profile data is not yet loaded.

requirements.summary: Replace the header logo image with the uploaded image.png as a static asset
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo img element displays the uploaded image.png
The image is saved as a static asset in frontend/public/assets/image.png
The img src attribute points to the correct asset path
The image maintains appropriate dimensions for the header logo

file_operations.description: Save the uploaded image.png file as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/image.png to be used as the new header logo.

Update the img element's src attribute within the header logo link to point to '/assets/image.png'. Ensure the image dimensions are appropriate for the header logo display and maintain existing alt text and styling attributes.
